title: Does LinkIn Park have any love songs? - Quora

response.answer_text: well in the traditional sense no. but they do have lots of songs about love. the songs The Messenger or Final Masquerade are probably the closest things to love songs they have(the former being closer than the latter). chester benningtons second band Dead by Sunrise did have a song that he actually did sing at his wedding though called Give Me Your Name.

oooh nice a question i have to think about, i think a few love songs by Linkin Park are: leave out all the rest, the Messenger, invisible, halfway right and sorry for now. there are a lot of love song that don;t realy mention love in a clear way these songs list mention it almost directly
